articles.headline: TAXES: Finding the biggest deadbeats
articles.summary: An investigation into property tax delinquents in Charlotte County, discovering a substantial amount of uncollected revenue due to improper management.

articles.headline: SPOTLIGHT: Simple sorts reveal cops' overtime jackpot
articles.summary: Analysis reveals that Hartford police officers earned significant overtime, leading to unexpected high median incomes.

articles.headline: FIRST VENTURE: Learning lessons while tracing pol's spending
articles.summary: Exploration of campaign spending patterns sparked by a gift received during an interview, leading to insights into the political spending habits of a state senator.

articles.headline: Historical spending data
articles.summary: Database Library compiles data on federal spending to help journalists analyze changes over decades in community federal investment.

articles.headline: IRE's chief trainer moves on
articles.summary: Ron Nixon departs from IRE and NICAR to become the computer-assisted reporting editor at the Star Tribune, marking a shift in his journalism career.
